items.sentence: Mary and some other women were here for a few hours.
Mary has a pretty smile and is always very friendly.
Mary has been looking for a job since she graduated.
Mary is a nice girl, except that she talks too much.
If you need a dictionary, I can lend you my old one.
Tom\'s barn was struck by lightning twice last year.
Tom\'s design saved the company millions of dollars.
Tom, what\'s wrong? Are you in some kind of trouble?
Tom knew that the dog on the porch belonged to Mary.
Tom knew who Mary thought was going to win the race.
